data.eml:eml: Two new species of Helicopsyche Siebold 1856 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Helicopsychidae) from Pará State, northern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Neto, Jaime De Liege Gama, Ribeiro, José Moacir Ferreira, Passos, Mahedy Araujo Bastos (2019): Two new species of Helicopsyche Siebold 1856 (Insecta: Trichoptera: Helicopsychidae) from Pará State, northern Brazil. Zootaxa 4565 (3): 420-426, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4565.3.8
